title: 24 Hour Days
description: Extends the Minecraft day to last 24 hours instead of 20 minutes

features.label: Mathematically adjusts the Minecraft day time to last 24 hours intead of 20 minutes
Perfect for servers that are online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week that want realtime reflected in game

Compatible with Multiplayer Sleeping to allow for players to skip nights and set time to morning
Sleeping is otherwise disabled
Datapack is reliate on accurate tick speed (tps) of your world/server, a laggy server or world with low tps may experience longer days. Ensure you have a constant 20tps for accurate time adjustment
Convert real time to Minecraft time with <a href="/tools/minecraft-time" class="read-more">Time Converter<a> and have your ingame time relfect the real world
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
